name: Undercooked (Tech Hub 2021, HaydenV, Dylan Fries)
description:
Keep the customers happy in this space-bound run-down bug-burger joint.

Grill Burgers by putting a burger on the stove and flipping it after 5 seconds then take it and give it to a customer. Pizzas are also a servable food by just interacting with the pizza oven in the top right side of the map. Just under that is the drink fridge where you can grab a drink and give it to a customer.

The Team:

Akshdeep - Stove/Title Screen

Dom - UI/Music/Sound effects

Bailey - Pizza Oven/Controller

Malakai - Drink fridge/Sound effects/Customers

Jacob - Programming customers/sound effects

Hayden - Drink Spill/some concepts

Brandon - Trash bin/chute

Cat - Background art/Player animation/sounds

Evan - Storage Unit/Score UI

Gurdain - Condiment Fridge/Restock Method/sound effects/Title Screen
